channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Questions: 1. How do i make npcs drop stuff? I think im supposed to edit npcdrops.cfg, but i put stuff in there and nothing is dropping
here is my npcdrops.cfg
[code] //--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 283 -1 5698 1 npcdrop = 283 -1 1201 1 npcdrop = 283 -1 1025 1
[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST][/code]
2. How do i make you not have to have runes in your inventory to cast spells? - basicly i wnat it so that you dont have to have runes to cast THANKS!!!

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

ok ty ill check that!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2007, 08:10:41 PM[/size][hr]ok i changed the case to this [code]case 2875:

  if(playerLevel[1] < 40) {

sendMessage(“You are now training Defence and Hitpoints (3.5 seconds between clicks please).”);

setAnimation(1978);

addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[3]), 3);

addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[1]), 1);

updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

} else {
sendMessage(“You are too high for this!!!”);
break;
[/code]
and now i have 44errors, after adding the else { sendMessage("You are too high for this!!!");

but before that i had 2…

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Your missing ending bracket.

A } above break;

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

i think you are missing one of the } starting or finishing but one thing dont have the
addSkillXP((500playerLevel[3]), 3);
change it to
addSkillXP((500playerLevel[3]), 1);
if you have the first one skill 3 will mutiply so you got 500 xp then 2k xp because 500x3 is 1500+ 500 from the first hit

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

help you guys, i have 2 errors in my compiler…

client.java: 5575: orphaned case
case 2514

client.java: 5892 illegal start of expression
public void objectClick2(int objectID, int ObjectX, int ObjectY) {[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2007, 08:05:05 PM[/size][hr]and then once i add in [code]case 2875:

  if(playerLevel[1] < 40) {

sendMessage(“You are now training Defence and Hitpoints (3.5 seconds between clicks please).”);

setAnimation(1978);

addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[3]), 3);

addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[1]), 1);

updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

break;
[/code]

i get 45 errors wtf?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Coldbloodio:

go into your client.java and find what spell you dont want to have runes for example - ctrl + F - search for ice barrage and delete the - deleteitem(556, 1 crap

Or you can change true to false? Because if you delete that you have to delete if(playerHasitem and the else.

Read full topic

np make sure you tab if you dont you get problems i used to space and always did it wrong

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

go into your client.java and find what spell you dont want to have runes for example - ctrl + F - search for ice barrage and delete the - deleteitem(556, 1 crap

also you might want to have a notepad program that shows visble spaces when your doing npcdrops and autospawn and shop items…Textpad works good for that I also use notepad ++

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

Questions:

  1. How do i make npcs drop stuff? I think im supposed to edit npcdrops.cfg, but i put stuff in there and nothing is dropping

here is my npcdrops.cfg

[code]
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 283 -1 5698 1
npcdrop = 283 -1 1201 1
npcdrop = 283 -1 1025 1

[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST][/code]

  1. How do i make you not have to have runes in your inventory to cast spells? - basicly i wnat it so that you dont have to have runes to cast
    THANKS!!!
